name: CORS Error in Browser
error_message: Access to fetch at 'http://api.example.com' from origin 'http://localhost:3000' has been blocked by CORS policy

conversation.user_input: Browser console error: Access to fetch at 'http://api.example.com' from origin 'http://localhost:3000' has been blocked by CORS policy: No 'Access-Control-Allow-Origin' header
